inclusion.criterion: vaginal or caesarean delivery and are feeling well
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: confounding variables due to previous positive or negative experiences from expressing milk
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: infant will have been born at less than 32.0 weeks of gestation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intend to breastfeed and are planning to pump milk on site in the NICU at least once/day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: smoke, are taking medication that may interfere with breastfeeding, and who have undergone prior breast surgery will not be excluded since they are their own control
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: able to understand the directions and sign a consent form in English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: survival as determined by the attending physician
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: mastitis will not be recruited for the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Vulnerable Subjects. No vulnerable subjects will be included in this study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 32-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO, and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has no prior pregnancies and does not smoke or use drugs.
